item.title: Report X-2025020835
item.description:
Report X-2025020835

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-17
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Two points of a Ltd Qty label printed on the manufacturer's carton are sticking out from behind the shipper's barcode/shipping label and "LTD QTY REQUIRED" printed on barcode/label - no other markings on pkg. Contents are 6 x 13 oz. metal aerosol cans of paint/primer. Pressurized contents will be repacked as prescribed.
